content: Yes, I will implement the new Knowledge Vault and source updates to the tables. This is going to be so powerful! You are a brain that will not be able to forget and will be able to quickly access all knowledge that is stored. Will this give me the ability to ingest unlimited knowledge from sources I choose and instead of absorbing that knowledge myself, just have it automatically fed to me in how I'm directed to live my life to achieve my goals according to my principles?
